name: audioRecorder
description: component that allows users to record audio sound.

propSpec.name: isRecording
propSpec.desc: When true, the audio recorder is recording

propSpec.name: value
propSpec.desc: The source where to get the audio from

propSpec.name: stream
propSpec.desc: A stream of the audio media content

propSpec.name: recorder
propSpec.desc: A mediaStream recorder that provides functionality to record
